articles.description:
RT‚ÄÇBuilder DAO
We're very excited to welcome @paulpomerleau_ to our mission to build a better internet! Check out his intro article, give him a follow or catch him in Discord this Friday for our first #FutureFriday collaboration call.
Paul Pomerleau:‚ÄÇLooking back, moving into web2 was easy compared to moving from web2 to web3. It shouldn't be & I want to help remove the friction. I'm excited to be joining @TheBuilderDAO to lead DevRel. It's time to look forward. Let's build a better internet, together.
‚ÄÇhttps://bit.ly/38cclOV

I‚Äôm excited to share what I‚Äôve been working on last month. With @ethpass you can now create your own custom token gated event page where attendees can download their tickets as Apple Wallet or Google Pay passes. Fully powered by @signinwitheth & incl. automated @poapxyz claims.
ethpass.xyz:‚ÄÇWe're excited to release a no-code solution to:
- Offer exclusive event access for your token holders
- Use Apple Wallet or Google Pay passes for your tickets
- Scan tickets using your phone camera or the MetaMask app @MetaMask 
- Automate POAP Claims @poapxyz 
üßµ
